    the method creates and add new team to the system IFF the team does not exist.
    Team[]
    eliteTeamsArrangedByGoalsGap(int gap)
    elite teams are defined as teams with total goals gap (in-out) bigger or equals to the parameter gap that is received to this method then the method arrange the teams according to this gap from highest to lowest notice: if two teams have the same goals gap then the are compared according to the total fans number of each team.

    • addMatchResult

      public boolean addMatchResult(String tIdA, String tIdB, String mId, Date date, int totalTime, int tAgoals, int tBgoals, boolean penaltyEnd, short tAYellowCards, short tBYellowCards, short tARedcards, short tBRedcards)
      the method adds a Match result that occurred between two teams, Team A and Team B. in addition the result details. first search for the teams and match if they exist, create the match result object and then add it to the proper objects.
      Parameters:
      tIdA -
      tIdB -
      mId -
      totalTime -
      tAgoals -
      tBgoals -
      penaltyEnd -
      tBRedcards -
      tARedcards -
      tAYellowCards -
      tBYellowCards -
      date -
      Returns:
      if successfully added match result to both match the the involved teams

    • eliteTeamsArrangedByGoalsGap

      public Team[] eliteTeamsArrangedByGoalsGap(int gap)
      elite teams are defined as teams with total goals gap (in-out) bigger or equals to the parameter gap that is received to this method then the method arrange the teams according to this gap from highest to lowest notice: if two teams have the same goals gap then the are compared according to the total fans number of each team.
      Parameters:
      gap -
      Returns:
      Team[] contains the elite teams arrange by goals gap, number of fans

    • getXDifferentPlayerWithOneSkill

      public Player[] getXDifferentPlayerWithOneSkill(int x)
      the method searches the players for total of X player that has exactly one skill from every team.
      Parameters:
      x -
      Returns:
      Player[] Array of X player from every team sorted by team representation country.

    • InterestFunding

      public Fund[] InterestFunding(int total)
      Interest funding is a fund which was give from a sponsor to a team that represents his(sponsor) country
      Parameters:
      total -
      Returns:
      Fund[] that contains Interest funds

    • getTeamsFundAndTotal

      public String[] getTeamsFundAndTotal()
      the method return an array of strings where each string is a combination of three raws first row is the team second row indicates if the team received fund third row shows the Amount of received fund Warning: the use of String.format() is compulsory(must) NOT USING IT WILL CAUSE LOSING POINT
      Returns:
      String[] that contains Objects as indicated above

    • extendedMatcheswithoutPenaltyKicks

      public MatchResult[] extendedMatcheswithoutPenaltyKicks()
      the method search for all matches where the time was extended but the game was over before getting to the penalty stage.
      Returns:
      MatchResult[] that contains objects that satisfy the above.
